TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlHead extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlHead Inherits HtmlGenericControl

summary.span: 提供对服务器代码中 HTML 元素的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element in server code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML `head` 元素是一个容器，可包含有关该页的其他信息。The HTML `head` element is a container that can contain additional information about the page. 此 控件可用于指定可在运行时访问的页格式设置信息。The control is useful for specifying page formatting information that can be accessed at run time. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在异步回发过程中以编程方式添加样式或样式规则。Adding styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发会更新页面区域，而无需更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft Ajax 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式访问 控件，以将 `title` 和 `style` 元素动态添加到 `head` 页面的元素中。The following example shows how to programmatically access the control to dynamically add `title` and `style` elements to the `head` element of the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/CS/htmlheadclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/VB/htmlheadclassvb.aspx#1)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadCstr/CS/htmlheadcstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadCstr/VB/htmlheadcstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示 控件中的样式规则的 实例。

span.span: Gets an instance that represents the style rules in the control.

value.span: 一个表示 控件中的样式规则的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the style rules in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个 ，它表示控件中嵌入的样式规则 。The property returns an that represents the embedded style rules in the control. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在异步回发过程中以编程方式添加样式或样式规则。Adding styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发会更新页面区域，而无需更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft Ajax 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式为 HTML 元素添加嵌入的样式规则 `body` 。The following example shows how to programmatically add an embedded style rule for the HTML `body` element. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/CS/htmlheadclasscs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadClass/VB/htmlheadclassvb.aspx#2)]
